snippet: The New England Patriots barely missed a beat when Tom Brady served his monthlong "Deflategate" suspension, going 3-1 and keeping up with the undefeated Super Bowl champion Denver Broncos....
lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots barely missed a beat when Tom Brady served his monthlong "Deflategate" suspension, going 3-1 and keeping up with the undefeated Super Bowl champion Denver Broncos.

headline.main: NFL HALFWAY: Tom Brady Is Back and Better Than Ever
headline.print_headline: NFL HALFWAY: Tom Brady Is Back and Better Than Ever
